text: Klim Shipenko (; born 16 June 1983) is a Russian film director, screenwriter, actor and producer. ==Filmography== ===As director=== * Night Express (2006) * White Night (2006) * Neproshchennye (2009) * 1000 Kilometers from My Life (2010) * Vsyo prosto (2012) * Love Does Not Love (2014) * The Nerd's Confession (2016) * Salyut 7 (2017) * Text (2019) * Serf (2019) ===As screenwriter=== * Night Express (2006) * White Night (2006) * Neproshchennye (2009) * 1000 Kilometers from My Life (2010) * Vsyo prosto (2012) * Love Does Not Love (2014) * Salyut 7 (2017) ===As actor=== * Neproshchennye (2009) * Vsyo prosto (2012) * Salyut 7 (2017) ===As producer=== * White Night (2006) * Night Express (2006) * Vsyo prosto (2012) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Russian film directors Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Klim Shipenko
